roleset.name: relate
roleset.note: INTERRELATE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from interrelate.01-v)

example.name: No Arg2
example.text: Comprehensive, coordinated, community-based programs can interrelate the client's health, social, educational, employment, and recreational needs.
example.arg: the client's health, social, educational, employment, and recreational needs

example.name: All args
example.text: We interrelate the declinable words to those abstract concepts

example.name: Passive
example.text: [Hearing and listening]-1 are interrelated [*T*]-1 but distinctly different skills.
